SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.QA_CATEGORY, B.QA_STATUS, B.SECRET_YN, A.IDX, A.PARENT_IDX, A.QA_SUBJECT, A.QA_CONTENT, A.ATTACH_FILE_IDX, A.USE_YN, A.CREATE_IDX, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_IDX, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM qna A INNER JOIN qna_config B ON A.IDX = B.QNA_IDX WHERE A.PARENT_IDX IS NULL
) AS CNT_TB

SELECT ROWNUM_TB.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RN, B.QA_CATEGORY, B.QA_STATUS, D.CODE_NM AS QA_STATUS_CODE_NM, B.SECRET_YN, A.IDX, A.PARENT_IDX, A.QA_SUBJECT, A.QA_CONTENT, A.ATTACH_FILE_IDX, A.USE_YN, A.CREATE_IDX, IFNULL(C.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 회원')AS CREATE_NICKNM, A.CREATE_DATE FROM qna A INNER JOIN qna_config B ON A.IDX = B.QNA_IDX LEFT JOIN users C ON A.CREATE_IDX = C.IDX LEFT JOIN code D ON B.QA_STATUS = D.CODE AND D.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'QA_STATUS_CODE', (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) temp WHERE A.PARENT_IDX IS NULL
) AS ROWNUM_TB ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{amount}
SELECT IDX, QNA_IDX, QA_EMAIL_RECV_YN, QA_CATEGORY, QA_STATUS, SECRET_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE FROM qna_config WHERE IDX = #{idx}

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT IDX, convert(idx, char(100)) AS CTE_PATH, 1 LVL, PARENT_IDX, QA_SUBJECT, QA_CONTENT, ATTACH_FILE_IDX, USE_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_IDX, UPDATE_DATE FROM qna WHERE IDX = #{idx} UNION ALL SELECT A.IDX, concat(CTE.CTE_PATH, '-', A.IDX) AS CTE_PATH, LVL + 1 LVL, A.PARENT_IDX, A.QA_SUBJECT, A.QA_CONTENT, A.ATTACH_FILE_IDX, A.USE_YN, A.CREATE_IDX, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_IDX, A.UPDATE_DATE FROM qna A INNER JOIN CTE ON A.PARENT_IDX = CTE.IDX ) SELECT IDX, CTE_PATH, LVL, PARENT_IDX, QA_SUBJECT, QA_CONTENT, ATTACH_FILE_IDX, USE_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_IDX, UPDATE_DATE FROM CTE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna ( PARENT_IDX, QA_SUBJECT, QA_CONTENT, ATTACH_FILE_IDX, USE_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{parentIdx}, #{qaSubject}, #{qaContent}, #{attachFileIdx}, 'Y', #{createIdx}, SYSDATE() )

INSERT INTO qna_config ( QNA_IDX, QA_EMAIL_RECV_YN, QA_CATEGORY, QA_STATUS, SECRET_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{qnaIdx}, #{qaEmailRecvYn}, #{qaCategory}, #{qaStatus}, #{secretYn}, #{createIdx}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET QA_SUBJECT = #{qaSubject}, QA_CONTENT = #{qaContent}, ATTACH_FILE_IDX = #{attachFileIdx}, UPDATE_IDX = #{userIdx}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE IDX = #{qnaIdx}
UPDATE qna_config SET QA_STATUS = #{qaStatus}, UPDATE_IDX = #{updateIdx}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE QNA_IDX = #{qnaIdx}
